channel.title: Pay 2 Win takes on a new meaning [MAYBE]
channel.description:
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/fc2f48c2bca0872e9e99060a059496ae.png[/img]
Why would they even think about this. I understand it's only a satisfaction survey, but obviously if they're polling the idea, they are considering adding it to game.

item.title: Pay 2 Win takes on a new meaning [MAYBE]
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Fuscate, post:3, topic:550312”]

read these before jumping to conclusions[/quote]
You’re giving them too much credit. If there’s money to be made they’ll do it, they’re just getting their feet wet. Jagex isn’t making these decisions, it’s their investors which have the majority say since andrew left. They did similar shit to maplestory.

http://www.reddit.com/r/runescape/comments/2r0ceo/this_needs_to_stop_and_it_needs_to_stop_now/

Read full topic
item.source: Pay 2 Win takes on a new meaning [MAYBE]

item.title: Pay 2 Win takes on a new meaning [MAYBE]
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:550312”][quote author=Fuscate link=topic=669222.msg4475085#msg4475085 date=1425301792]

read these before jumping to conclusions
[/quote]
I have.

Why would they even think about it in the first place then?
What would be the point in asking if we want it or not if "They have no intention of adding it"
If they are not adding this, it will be similar to it, based on Mod Balance’s replies.[/quote]

Exactly.

Read full topic

item.title: Pay 2 Win takes on a new meaning [MAYBE]
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

No. just no… :palm:

I think they realized it’s a dying community and now they try to milk the last of it.
Has been like that before actually, but now it’s too much.

Read full topic
